website_summaries.verdict: The Microsoft Surface 2 is great for getting work done, but those looking for extensive app support (beyond Office) will find top Apple, Android, and Amazon tablets to be better options.
pros: The Microsoft Surface 2 has a sturdy build, smooth gaming performance, and high-quality cameras
Windows RT 8.1 is easier to use than before, and the built-in photo-editing tools and Xbox Music are fantastic features
Office 2013 is included for free, and thanks to a new kickstand angle, the tablet is less likely to fall off your lap
cons: App support still lags behind competitors, and Windows RT is still incompatible with legacy programs
It's too easy to mistakenly push the tablet into its lower stance, and the touch pad on the Type Cover 2 isn't as comfortable as it was on the previous version

website_summaries.verdict: The Microsoft Surface 2 brings the Windows RT tablet back with better hardware, a refined design, and expanded productivity tools.
pros: Improves upon a great design with high-res display and improved kickstand
Faster performance thanks to Nvidia Tegra 4 processor
All-day battery lasts more than 14 hours
Comes with Office RT 2013 (now with Outlook), Best of Skype package, and 200GB SkyDrive storage
cons: Type Cover and Surface Pen sold separately
Intel Atom processor can't compete with Intel Core CPUs
Power connector is loose and bulky

customer_reviews.title: Product doesnt work for what I needed it to do
customer_reviews.text: I am a graphic design major and wanted to buy another microsoft surface to download the programs I needed for my classes. This device didnt allow me to do that so I will have to waste some of my money to return the device to only get a portion of my money back. I would only be a good tablet for those who only want to use it for apps from the microsoft store and browsing the internet.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Riffle

customer_reviews.title: Right price for this Refurbished compact Surface Tablet!
customer_reviews.text: The price was right. Had initial problem, but just an initial glitz and had no further problem after contacting MS IT. I like it that it has MS Office to do my word processing and power point on this small compact tablet. No more of that large laptop to lug around! It was also great that it has a five year service warranty for this refurbished product. Just what I need for teaching and travel!
customer_reviews.author: BD

customer_reviews.title: Microsoft recalled product
customer_reviews.text: This product is under recall from Microsoft. Microsoft does not support this product. Cannot access App Store and cannot update operating system even if you manually download and force update. You can user internet explorer and word but about it. Internet is no longer supported my Microsoft and industry standards for website don’t even optimize for it any more. So I don’t recommend.
customer_reviews.author: D. Ronan

customer_reviews.title: Not so good
customer_reviews.text: This was not so much of a good product, battery life sucked, screen quality was ok, material was alright. Overall.... Go with a Kindle. It's a ARM so it's not windows where you can install any programs.
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: Good product, I have personally been a fan of ...
customer_reviews.text: Good product, I have personally been a fan of the Surface and bought it after doing plenty of research. I agree that some apps support is not there, but that's okay. I am not looking for those apps and need productivity on the go. For me, this is good enough. For other things, I have a good laptop. I think in terms of productivity nothing can beat the Surface. I wish we had some additional browser support, maybe to install FF or Chrome, but IE is not too bad either. Overall a good device, looks neat and built thoughtfully.
customer_reviews.author: Subbu Parameswaran

customer_reviews.title: Microsoft surface 2
customer_reviews.text: The Microsoft surface 2, with Nvidia Terra 4 quad core, 2gb ram, 64gb hd, and windows 8.1rt is a big disappointment. I purchased this item because of a customer's video review, only there's was with 32gb hd, (everything else was supposedly the same.). I'm very disappointed I will not be buying another surface even if I return it. Microsoft you've let me down.
customer_reviews.author: LaFaye

customer_reviews.title: Not New
customer_reviews.text: Took a little bit longer than expected to receive. Also I was expecting a new out of the box surface but instead I received no paperwork whatsoever for the product, it didn't have the protective film on the screen(has a good inch long scratch, luckily its not on the screen), and there is a pretty bad dent on one of the corners. I haven't had any problem with the battery and overall I'm happy with the product itself. However, O do wish I just spent a little more money on the new Surface 3.
customer_reviews.author: Austen Christensen

customer_reviews.title: Best "computer" I ever had!
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than my old laptop, all tablet capabilities, removable keyboard for easy use on the go.... I love this thing I read at leas 100 reviews to make sure it had what I needed and I must say I have never been so satisfied with a purchase. I take it every where I go and with my galaxy s4 as a mobile hotspot I am never limited to its many functions. Internet word pre loaded programs it is a work and play machine HIGHLY RECOMMEND if you want a device you can used for life and not just for games or social media although its good for that too...
customer_reviews.author: Ash Walton

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a birthday gift and was excited to learn that it has Microsoft Word already on it. I hate how you have to buy it yearly now and with this surface 2 I don't have to worry about it. The battery last for about a week and I got the clip on keyboard and love it. I write my papers on it and surf the Web all the time on this tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Heather smith

customer_reviews.title: Good Surface
customer_reviews.text: Opened it up on Christmas for the SO. At first we were a bit disappointed. It didn't have any of the regular apps like candy crush or sephora and others that she likes which she has on her phone. We were at the brink of returning it. But after realizing we don't need a bigger version of a phone we already have... The pros are option of doing remote access to her work comp full office Apps have higher processing power requirement that Surface can handle but phones and some tablets may not have
customer_reviews.author: YeahBoy

customer_reviews.title: Loving my new Surface 2
customer_reviews.text: If I could give my tablet six stars, I would. This is my first tablet purchase, after weeks of researching this particular one. The limitations of the RT operating system is to be expected, so no complaints; the tablet does what I need it to do, and that's important to me. The free bundles of MS Office and unlimited Skype calls are a refreshing bonus. Won't get into the tech details, but it is a powerhouse by comparison. I am very pleased with my purchase here. Point to note: I'd recommend purchasing a touch or type cover as well. Pity it wasn't bundled with the tab.
customer_reviews.author: shelisa868

customer_reviews.title: Good while it last.
customer_reviews.text: As current college student, this Microsoft Surface 2 was a life saver. From games, Google docs, and watching Netflix, it did it all! However, after a year, it started crashing down on me. It wasn't responding well to the touch of my finger, pen, or the typing of the keyboard. It was good while it lasted.
customer_reviews.author: Hiedy

customer_reviews.title: Spend the money, go full windows.
customer_reviews.text: The hardware itself works. The problem is the OS. It's windows RT meaning that while you save battery you lose major abilities. Specifically you can only download apps from the Windows Store, a barren wasteland. You can only use internet explorer as nothing else is compatible with the tablet and you can't run any browser extensions of any sort. So this thing is basically a hamstringed netbook that looks prettier. 1.5/5
customer_reviews.author: Otis James Allen

customer_reviews.title: Don't skimp when buying electronics.
customer_reviews.text: This tablet is good for writing papers and other very basic functions. It only runs Internet Explorer which is archaic. The internet crashes at least 3-5x before it'll load which is very inconvenient. I wanted this for grad school because it's more portable than my Dell laptop. I thought it would run faster than my 6+ year old laptop,but I was wrong. I will be replacing this with a Chromebook or Pixel book.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Love love love tHis thing.
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing. All the power of a laptop, with the size and friendly use of a tablet. Perfect for dealing with my household bills and other computer stuff you need to do when you have a family and house to manage. There's no messing with apps or secondary sites to hook up your printer wirelessly or any other devices. If you want to get things done get this. If you want to use tons of apps try a tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Microsoft Surface 2
customer_reviews.text: I am so pleased with my tablet.purchase It arrived on time. it is much more than described. I love Amazon, and can count on there service and promises. I was going to purchase a competitor's tablet, however this one has additional features that none other has. At first I was concerned about not going with the ipad which my whole family professes to, but after careful study of the Microsoft, it became apparent to me that this is what I needed. I am so pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Country Girl in Illinois

customer_reviews.title: Not good for streaming online content.
customer_reviews.text: Was okay for a bit, but got very sluggish fast with minimal app installs. Buffers way too much on Pandora, but is okay most of the time on YouTube.
customer_reviews.author: Elijah S.

customer_reviews.title: I love the surface line but don't waste your time with ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the surface line but don't waste your time with the rt get the full windows 10 or pro the prices are propping and your not as limited but I love the portability and the screen resolution
customer_reviews.author: richard rehkop

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for what it is.
customer_reviews.text: My wife likes it a lot. It has the typical Microsoft drawbacks. Especially rapid battery drain. Certainly a better value than buying a brand new Surface 4.
customer_reviews.author: Frequent Amazoner

customer_reviews.title: It cannot install software like Google chrome
customer_reviews.text: Be aware that this is RT not a full windows install. It cannot install software like Google chrome, iTunes, vlc player, etc. It only allows you to download apps which are available in the windows store. This still has a full desktop which you can use to open edit and save word documents, use internet explorer normally, etc. It comes with Microsoft office (word, excel, note). My favorite feature is the mail app--all my email accounts in one place like on my iPhone. This is a great tablet for the price and the apps in the store include the usual suspects (Netflix, dropbox, Hulu, etc.) Get the keyboard as well it is superb!
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: and it works great for meeting my needs
customer_reviews.text: I am not tech savvy at all, but this tablet does the trick for me. I use it mostly for email and documents, and have had no issues with anything. The battery, fully charged, lasts about 3.5 hours per use. I also purchased a generic Bluetooth keyboard, and it works just as well as a regular MS keyboard (my friend has a MS keyboard). I have had this tablet and keyboard for over two months, and it works great for meeting my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Sue B.

customer_reviews.title: Surface2 is still an excellent tablet at a bargain price if you don't need the enhancements of the Surface3
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my great-grand-daughter' s 22nd birthday present. She said that's what she wanted, even though it was "last year's model", maybe because she knew I wouldn't spend the big bucks for the current Surface3.She loves her Surface2! It does exactly what she wants her tablet to do. She says she doesn't need the enhancements included with the Surface3.
customer_reviews.author: Chalmer Wren, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Substitute for A Laptop
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. I had to travel and remote back to my work PC from the road. This was perfect. Light, compact and still able to do everything I needed it to. This thing came all over Europe with me and performed excellently. I purchased the older model because I wasn't sure I'd use it after my trip but I've been home for a week now and I am certainly
customer_reviews.author: Obiwanspicoli

customer_reviews.title: My Best Investment
customer_reviews.text: I love my Surface!! It's worth every penny and then some. It's light, extremely portable and with all the Microsoft software pre-installed I'm able to complete all my homework in a timely manner.. It has a lot of the same functions as a laptop. I don't download a lot of apps, so this has been perfect for my needs... I will be buying the Surface 3 at tax time!!
customer_reviews.author: Mamamiss

customer_reviews.title: Email data entry problem
customer_reviews.text: Love the touch screen and all of the apps except that Windows Internet Explorer fails on email data entry - my wife is an experienced typist and is unable to type more than a few characters before the entry field locks up. She took it to a Microsoft Store and they were not able to fix it - they said that since it was an early model of the Surface it had known performance problems that couldn't be fixed.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: My Son Is Very Happy With It
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my son, and he is totally happy with it. It's his computer that replaced his old laptop. Go get the EEEKit Starter Kit and Type Cover to add to it, and you have everything you need. The external monitor and USB capability is really great. Super product.
customer_reviews.author: Parks Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Bad description of used product
customer_reviews.text: The device wouldn't charge at all. It came just like it said it would and showed up on time and it looked awesome. I plugged it in and let it charge overnight and turned it on in the morning and it would not power up so I plugged it back in to check the battery level, to my surprise it was at 1%! It would have been nice to know why the device was originally returned/refurbished, I would have been a little more picky when picking the device. Had I known it had a possibility of being damaged still, I would have made different arrangements. All in all a good product when it was plugged in, unusable when unplugged...
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Salem

customer_reviews.title: easy to use tablet and boy did I find the ...
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a reliable, easy to use tablet and boy did I find the perfect one with microsoft surface. It has kept my grandchildren entertained with videos watched on netflix and gotten my hubby with his lack of solid computer skills on the internet doing searches like a boss. Windows 8 works great on a tablet (something that windows 8 doesn't have going for it on a desktop).
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Not so great tablet
customer_reviews.text: May be the new ones are better, but this model is not at par with the competition. Battery dies out real fast, updates slow the system down.
customer_reviews.author: Sid

customer_reviews.title: Great Tablet, Awful OS
customer_reviews.text: I Absolutely love the hardware. The Surface 2 is a fantastic tablet. Unfortunately Windows 8.1 RT is a miserable operating system. Recommend avoiding the Nvidia ARM-based version.
customer_reviews.author: theslypig

customer_reviews.title: This tablet is perfect for what it does
customer_reviews.text: This tablet is perfect for what it does. I use it all the time to check my mail, check the web, and check the news. I also have Word and Excel on it so I can do more serious work on it. It is really a great tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy L. Crowley

customer_reviews.title: More useful than an ipad
customer_reviews.text: Love being able to use all Microsoft Office and all the features of a laptop. The kickstand is great, having the windows, expandable memory, and standard USB are awesome! Only downfall is the flash on the camera isn't very good, the Microsoft app market doesn't have every app yet, and simply learning the ins and outs of a new OS. Would still highly recommend over an ipad.
customer_reviews.author: Brent Cornwell

customer_reviews.title: Battery won't charge
customer_reviews.text: It would have been great........if it worked. I received it, followed set-up directions. I plugged in the charger, tablet came on......looked/felt great. Easy set up. Then I left it to charge. Came back 6 hours later and the battery hadn't charged at all. It worked great if plugged in, the second you removed the charger it died. Went online and saw that many users reported this issue. Too much trouble. I sent it back. Very dissapointed.
customer_reviews.author: REBECCA.CONNER

customer_reviews.title: nice tablet, just won't replace your laptop
customer_reviews.text: if you just need a tablet to play around with this is great!, i needed a tablet to replace my laptop and with this tablet you can only download microsoft apps no Itunes or away to hook up your phone, but if you want to replace your laptop get the surface PRO it is able to do alot more, I think this would be great for kids or just for taking notes in class
customer_reviews.author: Aaron St.Clair

customer_reviews.title: Microsoft-Surface 2
customer_reviews.text: Great size and weight. I've been plugging along on an old clunky laptop and this little machine is so much easier to carry. Taking some getting used to the new touch screen and apps. The tutorials aren't really clear, but everyday working on this machine is becoming more efficient. If you've been using an android or iOS, you'll probably be able to pick up the operating system easily enough. Going from Windows Vista has been more of a challenge.
customer_reviews.author: Dwanna Whitener

customer_reviews.title: Surface
customer_reviews.text: Is limited by it's number of apps in the Microsoft store and the Microsoft stores search is as bad as Bing. I did a search for a wireless printer app and it came back with everything but what I wanted, including games. It sucks big time. I am just starting to get comfortable with the Surface but so far it is OK, (except for the huge disparity of apps) Get it together Microsoft if you want to sell anymore of these.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Vittum

customer_reviews.title: Choice!
customer_reviews.text: Always nervous buying recon/refurb tech but this is pristine. As another review said, it won't quite replace your laptop, but it does significantly more than most tablets I've tried.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: So far I like it a lot
customer_reviews.text: So far I like it a lot. I'm certainly no computer whiz so my grandson set it up for me. (I'm a senior citizen). I wanted this Microsoft Surface 2 mostly because that's more or less the exact program I have on my main computer. My grandson is a better judge of this and he says it is really a good tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Anna

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for getting lighter for work.
customer_reviews.text: Ok, so I decided to buy this version for its added capacity and it is great. For work all I really need is the office package, already installed, and wireless capability. Really if you want to downsize and get lighter in what you carry this is perfect. The screen fits my bag perfectly and I really have no complaints about this PC.
customer_reviews.author: V. Bernal

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Tablet and GREAT Price !
customer_reviews.text: This was one amazing tablet yet it just could not do what I needed it to do. I would recommend this to ANYBODY ! Such a nice tablet, so sad to had to have returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Espich

customer_reviews.title: I love it. I read the reviews and although I ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I read the reviews and although I had to send two back this one is working great!!! I use it for my appointments and business. and Now I'm happy camper.
customer_reviews.author: nightowl25

customer_reviews.title: Some problems
customer_reviews.text: Has a lot of minor / major problems. Memory too small and seems to get hot. Needed to have it re-set by microsoft as the memory filled up for no reason
customer_reviews.author: J P Clarke

customer_reviews.title: Rt is out of date non upgradable no new aps
customer_reviews.text: Ugh windows rt is out of date. Microsoft won't help because it's used...also don't even use it for anything but surfing the web and your good. You have to spend atleast half a grand with Microsoft or Apple to get a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Regular Geek

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love the surface 2 .
customer_reviews.text: I love the surface. It is actually a mini computer. If you use the surface for office work I would suggest getting the keyboard. The surface is light and easy to carry. It comes with everything which is very convenient. No more downloading your own software or apps its awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle L. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Surface 2
customer_reviews.text: I had decided to purchase this at the last minute for a Christmas gift. It was exactly as described and shipped in 2 days so it did arrive before Christmas. I purchased this for my husband. He lives and dies by Outlook, so I needed a tablet that would do that. He is having to learn Windows 8, so that is a bit of a challenge. He loves the size and weight of the tablet. Still exploring what it can do. Love that it has the USB port unlike the ipad. As most people know, the ipad has more apps, but since he is not a "gamer" or into apps, it is not a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Lally

customer_reviews.title: A+ School Tablet!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these for my middle school and high school daughters. The largest advantage was that both came preloaded with Word, Excel, PowerPoint, etc. so I didn't have to buy them AGAIN. My 12 year old and 14 year old both rave that they only charge the tablet once every 2-3 days and use it on/off all day at school and home. Awesome product!!!
customer_reviews.author: AK83

customer_reviews.title: Defective and expired warranty
customer_reviews.text: WARNING... Apparently a lot of the Microsoft surface 2's have had battery problems. Mine was one of them. It will not hold a charge and I tried everything on the Internet to try and fix it. I also called Microsoft itself and they told me the WARRANTY HAS EXPIRED. Even though I bought it "brand new." I am very disappointed in the Microsoft surface 2 and the seller saying they sent me a "brand new" product and will be sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Darrin

customer_reviews.title: A great device IF I could use it unplugged.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a little bummed I spent 350 dollars on something that isn't working. I just got it and it keeps saying no battery detected. I tried updating and restarting and plugging it into a different outlet and nothing is working. I'm contacting the seller for a new one, but I'm disappointed that it's already having issues when I just bought it.
customer_reviews.author: christinam712

customer_reviews.title: Really good for middle school students
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 11 year old. He uses it at school. Inexpensive enough for him to take to school since it's the 2nd generation. His friends, who all have iPads, wish they had his Surface Pro 2 to write papers w the keyboard accessory. I love that I don't have to share my home computer w him anymore.
customer_reviews.author: JooJi

customer_reviews.title: glitchy like a computer
customer_reviews.text: I'm not much of a computer person, and I intended on using this to replace my iPad. Yeah, it's way more complicated than an iPad, glitchy like a computer, and overall unnecessarily difficult to use. I guess once I get used to it it will be okay, but it shouldn't take this long to get used to. It honestly doesn't do much an iPad couldn't make up for in apps.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer hicks

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Very good price for the Surface with Keyboard included. We use it every day and it is working perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Christina McCarthy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to use for everything like having a desktop computer and laptop!
customer_reviews.text: This tablet is the bomb! I use it everyday for school, for fun, to watch movies and everything else under the sun! No need to spend more money on the newer ones ! Just like having a lap top or computer!
customer_reviews.author: Marcia & Alban

customer_reviews.title: Bad PC
customer_reviews.text: Will not charge at all. I got it two hours ago and still says plugged in not charging
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Never new I will not be able to install google chrome on this item....I just want to urge microsoft to introduce google chrome and autocad software to there store...it will make life very beautiful for us
customer_reviews.author: OKUCHUKU KENTH GABRIEL

customer_reviews.title: Never thought this good
customer_reviews.text: It has everything I need like MS Office, basically is a home computer that comes in the form of Tablet that you can carry it every where. High resolution screen full HD, fast and powerful processor, light weight, thin and easy to work with, I wished I could say the same thing about the Microsoft support.
customer_reviews.author: Masoud Masgati

customer_reviews.title: I dont felt its not to  great for a price I paid
customer_reviews.text: Its nice and practical buth don't have to many memory and its nothing I can to change I felt I over paid
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: This was a gift for my grand-daughter. This tablet ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my grand-daughter. This tablet has given her nothing but trouble ever since I purchased it. The tablet turns off and will not come back on for several days and yes the battery is fully charged. This time it has been 3 weeks with just a black screen and nothing at all will come on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The tablet arrived on time and is just what we ...
customer_reviews.text: The tablet arrived on time and is just what we wanted. We called Microsoft several times to get the needed help in setting up the tablet. We also invested in the Surface 2 keyboard as it is much easier to use than the touch screen. Everything fits perfectly in the folio and we will be using the tablet a lot when we travel.
customer_reviews.author: L. D. Kelly

customer_reviews.title: I love it. It is easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I use a computer all day at work so was not anxious to get one for home. I finally gave in and ordered the Microsoft Surface 2. I love it. It is easy to use, convenient, and does not take up much space. I use Microsoft products at work so it was not much of a change for me.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Davis

customer_reviews.title: Get a newer model
customer_reviews.text: As time goes on, this is becoming more and more obsolete. it's not even worth the buy.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus Dumas

customer_reviews.title: Happy with Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I was happy with price and product. Microsoft Surface Touch is Like having a mini laptop. My husband can't look at interactive charts On it (perhaps no Java) but it does everything I want and need it to do. The Windows marketplace doesn't have as many aps as Android or Apple but other than that, I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: Rosebud

customer_reviews.title: Over all happy
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for at least a month now. Overall I am happy with the purchase, Donny like the fact that I can't use Google chrome... It won't let me download it as the default web browser. Also I was hoping that I could download apps from Google but that is a no go as well.
customer_reviews.author: READE ATKINSON

customer_reviews.title: not a bad value but should be better
customer_reviews.text: came in great condition but is super slow and freezes up a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Thiede

customer_reviews.title: One of the best tablets. It is fast
customer_reviews.text: One of the best tablets. It is fast, perfectly to work and study. It also has a excellent screen resolution. The main weakness is that this only relies on Microsoft apps and there is no app for Spotify, HBO go, tv go (Comcast app), and most of the banks apps that I wish I could use without using the Browser. In general, I think this a great tablet for those who want to study and work anytime everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: lennier

customer_reviews.title: Tablet
customer_reviews.text: It is a good product, just learning how to get around the tablet. I recommend this for someone who wants to get a tablet. So much hype about the Ipad....and I couldn't afford Apple's IPAD this I waited for months to get./ I recommend to other users.
customer_reviews.author: CARMELLA PLAGE

customer_reviews.title: If you like error messages, this is the product for you.
customer_reviews.text: Had problems out of the box. Would not move past the loading screen. Turned it off, and on again, then went through setup. Even connected to the internet, I could not create an account, activate the operating system, or check for updates. This product is garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Dadasaurus Rex

customer_reviews.title: Waited 4 months before posting a review
customer_reviews.text: I've had it for 4 months and it has been great. No problems or issues with it! I really love it even though it's smaller than the newer surface tablets. I prefer this one because it's smaller for school desks and I'm in college so the size makes a huge difference.
customer_reviews.author: Montoria

customer_reviews.title: Pretty neat Tablet
customer_reviews.text: Pretty neat Tablet and then also a working notebook/laptop. Use it as a tablet most of the time and it is great for that (mainly reading books) and use it as a working tool for meetings, emails and memos. Works well, no problems.
customer_reviews.author: KP TX

customer_reviews.title: liked it, wanted a little faster processor and more ...
customer_reviews.text: I have the Surface RT, liked it, wanted a little faster processor and more positions for the kickstand, wish the 2 laid back further like the Pro but that's a minor detail. I like the Surface family very much, spouse has the Pro 3 (finally gave up the Mac!) and he's enjoying it as well.
customer_reviews.author: R. Wood

customer_reviews.title: The system freezes from time to time which is annoying. I have yet to find the option to ...
customer_reviews.text: When I received the device it wasn't working properly-it was slow and unresponsive.I had to contact Microsoft to install updates. The system freezes from time to time which is annoying. I have yet to find the option to screen shot. Also the on screen keyboard doesn't work sometimes.I highly recommend buying the type screen cover because the device works better with it. I prefer Samsung tablets but I needed Word and Excel for school. Its light and compact which makes it easier to travel with.
customer_reviews.author: Tarah Monn

customer_reviews.title: What would I do without it?
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. We have an iPad, laptop, MAC, and kindle (and kindle fire), and this is definitely my GO-TO device. I plan everything on here and do most of my work. We homeschool our children and without this device, it would be much more difficult. GREAT product. Love that you can do multiple things at one time
customer_reviews.author: HSis

customer_reviews.title: In LOVE!!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, LOVE it!!! Glad I got the 64gb, plus I added another 64gb with a micro card so I have tons of memory so I was able to put all of my music, pictures, writing program...all of the things I need in one place. Best Christmas present to myself EV-ER!!!
customer_reviews.author: Island GirlTop Contributor: Eye Makeup

customer_reviews.title: I ordered a NEW surface 2 from this Angel seller ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a NEW surface 2 from this Angel seller and not only was it late, but the tablet came to me broken! I charged the tablet for a couple hours as soon as I took it out of the box, when I turned it on a blue screen came on saying that my pc needed to be repaired. Now that doesn't make sense considering it is a "NEW" tablet! Now it's turning on and off with that same blue screen.... Total bs.
customer_reviews.author: Krisma

customer_reviews.title: Cant upgrade OS
customer_reviews.text: Takes a bit to get on to system, didnt like "no expand ability or upgrade of OS
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Takes time, but I'm optimistic
customer_reviews.text: I'm still getting used to it. But I don't like that MicroSoft ditched Windows Live Mail, because I can't get my default mail account on the Surface 2. First they ditched my Outlook Express, and now this. If they think I'm going to settle for Outlook, they can think some more.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki A. Small

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after a few months. Beware of this seller!
customer_reviews.author: brittaford

customer_reviews.title: The surface is performing great. I have only had it for a couple ...
customer_reviews.text: The surface is performing great. I have only had it for a couple of months but the screen size is wonderful and it is very user friendly. I bought a refurbished one and it works flawlessly. I use it as a tablet and a lot of times I will use my wireless keyboard and use it like my desktop.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend buying anything from this seller
customer_reviews.text: This product did not say it was "refurbished" but upon further inspection, it is in fact a "refurbished" Surface 2. It never worked when I got it. It would not charge, and stated "battery not found" as if it was unrecognizable from within. I would not recommend buying anything from this seller. Very misleading and very disappointed. I brought it to the Microsoft Store directly, and the replaced it all for me. I would recommend going to the store directly.
customer_reviews.author: J. Carr

customer_reviews.title: Its a great tablit but you have to have a Microsoft account ...
customer_reviews.text: Its a great tablit but you have to have a Microsoft account to use it all the way and the app store is very limited. Oh and its default such engine is bing (not my favorite) other than that the batteries life is great the functions all work very well its responsive and its display beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Dwight

customer_reviews.title: Surface 2 a good buy
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a small tablet that could replace my aging laptop. I really like this one! It's very light-weight and the screen is a good size... not too small. The only drawbacks I've found in the month I've had it are: Not compatible with my HP printer and doesn't have any of the standard card games pre-loaded. Still worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Sweet Sam

customer_reviews.title: Can't Install Windows Files
customer_reviews.text: Just not a good tablet overall you can tell that it is definitely the basic model that was the start of a revolutionary tablet but you're better off finding a 2-in-1 or a different system altogether
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Harrison

customer_reviews.title: This thing is amazing. I use it to take notes in class ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing. I use it to take notes in class and its seamless and faster then taking notes by hand. You can switch between google, your email and note taking in seconds!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua R.

customer_reviews.title: BAD tablet.
customer_reviews.text: Limited applications and windows RT is not user friendly. better off going with surface 2 pro or any of the newer versions.
customer_reviews.author: Karan P.

customer_reviews.title: Love this Product!!!
customer_reviews.text: I got this product and I love it!!! It is the best computer/tablet I've had. It comes with word, power point, excel, etc. And it can be used for work or school. It is travel sized and light weight where as many computers are too big this one is fit to size perfectly. My only compliant would be it doesn't come with a keyboard. I highly recommend this product for school or work purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wife got this as a Christmas present. Mainly used ...
customer_reviews.text: Wife got this as a Christmas present. Mainly used for watching Netflix so far. She absolutely loves the big display screen and loves the picture quality - just wait until she discovers all the other features! This tablet exceeded all her expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Al H

customer_reviews.title: NO keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Maybe you should take the photo down of this unit having a keyboard.... Looks like its included.....
customer_reviews.author: spike

customer_reviews.title: Worst purchase I have ever made.
customer_reviews.text: Worst purchase I have ever made. This is a pain to try and navigate and the only browser that would work on it was explorer, which is by far the worst of them all. Then within a month the battery would not charge. Now the Internet won't work on it either. It sucks as a tablet, it sucks as a laptop, therefore it just sucks all around. I really cannot find anything to say that I liked about it.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This is all I need, I love this tablet. Outlook, Microsoft offices, a full internet browser!!! Windows 8.1 runs great and smooth and has really good battery life. This tablet gives me a full PC experience and feels great on my hands, it feels like a upscale device not cheap and plastic feeling like others.
customer_reviews.author: Ceazz

customer_reviews.title: GREAT 5 star product
customer_reviews.text: Awesome piece of equipment. Going in next couple of days to get the Pro 3. If you want to save many docs or picks get the 128. But even with the 56 there is mining storage and the cloud included in purchase. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Thrash54

customer_reviews.title: works perfect and is everything I thought it would be
customer_reviews.text: Brand new, works perfect and is everything I thought it would be. Its very suiting for travel and since I am in college it make for a perfect tablet to do my homework on. Very pleased with this product!
customer_reviews.author: B&B

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly powerful machine. Love the kick stand and quick start!,
customer_reviews.text: Loved the machine. Fast, powerful processor. Loads and runs apps in a snap! Had some trouble with it getting hot and not starting until it cooled down. Had to return it for replacement. All is well now.
customer_reviews.author: BossWolf

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Service
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived on time, as ordered. Unfortunately, it did not come with much in the way of instruction and there is a high learning curve for this device - of course, this is not the fault of Amazon, perhaps just something to pass along to Microsoft for future purchasers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It said battery is not detected, and only worked ...
customer_reviews.text: It said battery is not detected, and only worked while it was plugged in!!!!!!! What's the point of having a tablet if I can't take or anywhere??????? Sending back asap and getting another one from other seller
customer_reviews.author: luis

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loved it, but it was really hard to figure ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved it, but it was really hard to figure out. It would not charge. After looking out it up. Apparently it had to be updated in order for the computer to charge. After updating for like 8 hours. My daughter is enjoying her tablet. If wouldn't have been for a family friend that knows about electronic I probably would have returned it.
customer_reviews.author: isabel

customer_reviews.title: Came not factory reset.... can't login ...
customer_reviews.text: Came not factory reset....can't login because password is not know! Can't factory reset from login screen bcuz I don't have the bit key
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't seem to want to hold a charge. I ...
customer_reviews.text: Didn't seem to want to hold a charge. I tried to return it and was told it was past the return date. My son likes it, just needs to be charged often.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: i love my surface, been using it for a month now without any mayor problem, sometimes it does get stuck but mostly because of the app that was using... something I would like to inform anyone that is buying it is that when you receive it you have to charge it and then turn it on, because it doesn't come with start up battery life from the package (I was worried when t came to me and did jot turn on at first(
customer_reviews.author: rebeca

customer_reviews.title: ... but I have to say this has been very easy to use and I'm really enjoying continuing to explore ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm not as computer savvy as most of the younger population but I have to say this has been very easy to use and I'm really enjoying continuing to explore all the possibilities!
customer_reviews.author: Regina M. Cote

customer_reviews.title: A great tablet worth considering
customer_reviews.text: Awesome tablet. Almost all of the benefits of a windows pc but in a small form factor and for a tiny price. It works well with almost all of my devices (external HD's, flash drives, printer, camera). The app store is growing and is by no means a deal breaker. It comes with a free version of Office 2013, which works great on this device. The optional accessories are impressive. The battery has been lasting around 9 hours with moderate use.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Christmas score!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my wife for Christmas. It is a near perfect blend of PC and tablet in its functionality. My only complaint is the cost of the accessories, but since I knew the costs when I ordered I didn't reflect that in my scoring.
customer_reviews.author: J. Thomas

product_meta.title: Microsoft Surface 2 (32 GB)
product_meta.description:
Size:32 GB

SURFACE 2
The 10" tablet that comes with Office1.

At just under 1.5lbs, and pre-loaded with Office 2013 RT (now with Outlook), Surface 2 lets you carry less while you do more. Light in your hands, but loaded with improved graphics and Dolby audio, plus a faster processor, you can do more, wherever you are.

COMES WITH WINDOWS AND OFFICE
Surface 2 runs Windows RT 8.1 and comes with Office RT 2013 so you get touch-optimized versions of Outlook, Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and OneNote right out of the box.2 Create different user accounts for privacy and security.

MORE THAN A TABLET
The 2-position Kickstand lets you work on your lap or at a desk, so you can work comfortably, no matter where you are. Use the onscreen keyboard or click in a keyboard3 and work even faster. Ports let you transfer files, connect to printers, get more storage, and plug into bigger displays4. Whether you want to work alone or collaboratively, Surface 2 goes beyond "tablet" and functions like a real laptop.

READY FOR ANYTHING
Surface 2 runs on the NVIDIA Tegra 4 processor, making it one of the fastest tablets on the market. Thin, light, and with up to 10 hours of video playback, you can power through your day on a single charge.

BEAUTIFULLY ENTERTAINING
Stay entertained with all your favorite music, movies, and games. The 2-position Kickstand gives you a hands-free way to enjoy video on the Full HD display. Enjoy Dolby audio as you stream millions of songs for free, and import your iTunes playlists5. Integrate all your favorite social content with free apps like Facebook and Twitter. Choose from lots of apps in the Windows Store so you can do more.

SMILE FOR THE CAMERAS
With 1080p full HD video cameras, video chat has never looked better. The 3.5MP front-facing and 5MP rear-facing cameras take crisp pictures. Use the panorama feature to get a truly immersive photo experience.

AMAZING APPS
Surface 2 comes with apps that help you socialize, stay in touch, share and view documents, organize photos, listen to music, and watch movies. You can find even more apps in the Windows Store.





ACCESSORIES

Surface 2 Type Cover


Arc Touch Mouse


Surface VGA Adapter

1920x1080 resolution 12" display

256GB or 512GB with 8GB RAM Battery life Up to 10 hours of video playback Up to 9 hours of web browsing8 Kickstand 2-position Multi-position Surface pen included Palm block technology and 256 levels of pressure sensitivity Ports Full-size USB 3.0

Safety and warranty documents  1. Surface 2 comes with Microsoft Office 2013 RT. Some functionality may be limited. See Office.com/OfficeRT.
 2. Comes with Office Home and Student 2013 RT and Outlook 2013 RT. Some features and programs unsupported. See http://office.com/officeRT.
 3.  Surface Covers are sold separately.
 4.  Adapter may be required; sold separately.
 5.  Xbox Music account required. Data charges may apply. Limits on free streaming apply. Available Xbox Music features and content may vary over time. See xbox.com/music.
 6.  Testing consisted of full battery discharge during video playback. All settings were default except: Wi-Fi was associated with a network and Auto-Brightness disabled. Battery life varies significantly with settings, usage, and other factors.
 7. System software uses significant storage space. Available storage is subject to change based on system software updates and apps usage. 1 GB = 1 billion bytes. See Surface.com/Storage for more details.
 8. Testing consisted of full battery discharge while Internet browsing over Wi-Fi. Internet browsing was tested browsing 25 popular webpages. All settings were default except: Wi-Fi was associated with a network, auto-brightness disabled, and Bluetooth radio was turned off. Battery life varies with settings, usage, and other factors.
 9. All accessories are sold separately.
